<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set due dates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-due-date"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets due dates for multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Use this to establish deadlines for groups of tickets, such as when implementing project milestones or SLA compliance targets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with status/assignment filters → collect `TicketId` array
2. Determine due date: Calculate target date based on SLA requirements or project timeline
3. Bulk update: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-due-date](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-due-date) with ticket IDs and due date
4. Verify: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with date filter to confirm due dates are set

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketIds` array and `DueDate` (ISO 8601 format).

**Note**: Setting due dates may trigger reminder notifications if configured for the workflow.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/remove-due-date](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-remove-ticket-due-date) – Bulk remove due dates
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/due-dates](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-due-date) – Set single ticket due date
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/due-dates/reminders](/docs/api/tickets/save-ticket-due-date-reminders) – Configure reminders

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk setting ticket due dates.","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to update.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1},"Request":{"type":"object","description":"Due date configuration for bulk due date operations. Specifies how to calculate or set due dates on tickets.","properties":{"Type":{"type":"integer","description":"Due date calculation type. 0=PeriodAfterDueDate (relative), 1=FirstDayOfTheMonth, 2=LastDayOfTheMonth, 3=CustomDate (specific date), 4=Today, 5=EventDate, 99=Remove (clear due date).","enum":[0,1,2,3,4,5,99],"example":3},"Count":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of periods to add when Type=0 (PeriodAfterDueDate). For example, Count=5 with Period=Days means '5 days from now'.","example":5},"Period":{"type":"integer","description":"Period unit for relative due dates. 0=Days, 1=Weeks, 2=Months, 3=None.","enum":[0,1,2,3],"example":0},"CustomDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Specific due date when Type=3 (CustomDate). Ignored for other Type values.","example":"2026-01-31T17:00:00Z"},"Reminders":{"type":"array","description":"Optional list of reminder configurations to set along with the due date.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Reminder configuration for due date notifications.","properties":{"ReminderId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the reminder."},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the entity (ticket) this reminder is associated with."},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type identifier (typically ticket entity type)."},"PeriodCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of periods before due date to send reminder.","example":2},"PeriodType":{"type":"integer","description":"Period unit for reminder timing. 0=Days, 1=Weeks, 2=Months, 3=None.","enum":[0,1,2,3],"example":0},"ReminderType":{"type":"integer","description":"Type of reminder notification.","example":1},"ReminderDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Calculated date when reminder will be sent."}},"title":"Reminder"},"nullable":true}},"example":{"Type":3,"Count":0,"Period":3,"CustomDate":"2026-01-31T17:00:00Z"},"title":"DueDatePackage"}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"title":"BulkSetDueDateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
